me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.type

Class PrivateCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.Command
      • me.s3ns3iw00.jcommands.type.PrivateCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RoleLimitable, UserLimitable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GlobalCommand

    public class PrivateCommand
extends Command
implements UserLimitable, RoleLimitable
    A Command that can be only used in private message and can be limited for users and roles.
